name: jewel
content:
jewel noun [C]
(VALUABLE STONE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a precious stone that is used to decorate valuable objects: She was wearing a large gold necklace set with jewels.
Don Farrall/DigitalVision/GettyImages
a small precious stone or a piece of specially cut glass, used in the mechanism of a watch jewels [ plural ]
→
jewellery mainly UK : She wore satin opera gloves and heavy jewels.
